players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Bob, I'm concerned about your behavior last night. Can you tell us more about what happened?"
Charlie: "Bob, I think you're the mafioso. I want to lynch you."
You: "I'm the detective, I was just trying to cover for myself. Don't lynch me!"
Bob: "I don't think Charlie is the mafioso, I think Alice is. We should lynch Alice."

players.name: Bob
